text: Several proposals have already addressed the anaphora resolution problem by deliberately limiting the extent to which they rely on domain and/or linguistic knowledge , and by moving away from the traditional domain / sublanguage restriction .Observing a very clear trend towards inexpensive , knowledge - poor , corpus - based methods --- which remain robust and scale well --- it is clear that there is scope for much more to be done in this direction .
